= AS3 event model based W3C DOM 2/3=

The event model of *Maashaack* is based on the [http://www.w3.org/TR/DOM-Level-2-Events/events.html DOM2/3 W3C model events] and the implementation of the flash.events.* package in the !FlashPlayer 9 and 10.
